channel.title: [help] Error Loading [pi]

item.title: [help] Error Loading [pi]
item.dc:creator: @weed4u weed4u
item.description:
@weed4u wrote:

Ok so the client works for me but dose NOT work for others. I have tried to change all the ip’s on the client to mine all = Error loading…Please Report
Next i tryed to change the cache becuase it said in the cmd when i ran the client that there was an problem the the cache download (ALL TESTED ON LAPTOP). So i took the cache, took all the contents and placed them in a .zip, uploaded to fileden.com, put the cache link in the client like so [PI] (located in Cachedownloader.java) private final int VERSION = 1; // Version of cache //private String cacheLink = "http://uppit.com/28ue3guj7atk/CPS.zip"; // Link to cache private String cacheLink = "http://www.fileden.com/files/2011/4/6/3110129//cache.zip"; // Link to cache
There was also a code that had a cache link in it in client.java and heres that code drawLoadingText(0, "Connecting to File Server..."); new Update("http://www.fileden.com/files/2011/4/6/3110129//cache.zip", "cache.zip", signlink.findcachedir()); abyte0 = decompressors[0].decompress(i); } } catch (E …Save…Compile…Run all = Error Loading… Please Report.
I jared and signed it correctly then i added a .bat to go along with it to test for errors. When i Clicked on Run.bat it said…Java.ip.FileNotFoundException: C:\CruelalityXV2.0\Maps\mapconfig.txt From there i delted the whole cache off my computer and tryed it again and i got the same error… (dosnt say this error anymore but people still cant connect

To let everyone know i am portforwarded and i have tryed to google this. ( i also cannot give up this source & client i love it too much)
I have put a lot of work and explaining on what my problem is so i hope you can help thanks soo much…
